com.noelios.restlet.util
Class StringTemplate

java.lang.Object
  com.noelios.restlet.util.StringTemplate

public class StringTemplate
extends Object

Simple template class that enforces a strict separation between the template and the data model.
It supports interpolation (replacement of variables) and conditions.

processText

protected int processText(int state,
                          int tokenStart,
                          int tokenEnd,
                          StringBuilder buffer,
                          Map dataModel)
Processes a text token.

Parameters:
state - The current instruction state. (see STATE_INSTRUCTION_* constants).
tokenStart - The start index of the token to process.
tokenEnd - The end index of the token to process.
buffer - The string buffer containing the template result.
dataModel - The data model to use.
Returns:
The new state after processing.
